text: The Secretary and the Airports Authority may at any time negotiate an extension of the lease entered into under § 9-1004(a).
historical:

Short title: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 9-1001.

DC CODE § 9-1009

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Authority to negotiate extension of lease.
